研究揭示了法瓦豆蛋白对口中感觉细胞的影响慕尼黑技术大学莱布尼兹食品系统生物学研究所的研究人员首次研究了源自最爱豆的蛋白质结构如何影响人类口服触觉细胞的细胞模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/study-reveals-reveals-impact-fava-fava-bean-bean-proteins-on-sensory-cells-sensory-cells-in-the-mouth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/study-reveals-reveals-impact-fava-fava-bean-bean-bean-proteins-on-sensory-cells-sensory-cells-in-the-mouth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74A53B0F-B0E5-45FA-A840-20B2CF2B9C5B Sat, 25 Jan 2025 05:11:29 -0500 Study reveals impact of fava bean proteins on sensory cells in the mouth
在持续的冲突中，加沙的预期寿命减半根据《柳叶刀》上发布的新估计，加沙地带的预期寿命几乎被削减了一半（-46.3％）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/gazas-life-expectancy-halved-halved-amid-angoing-conflict.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/gazas-life-expectancy-halved-halved-amid-amid-ongoing-conflict.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9EB60E3-F1DB-4E11-A438-263D785FBA6C Sat, 25 Jan 2025 04:51:11 -0500 Gaza's life expectancy halved amid ongoing conflict
外科医生的偏好可能解释了CABG存活率的差异在接受冠状动脉搭桥术（CABG）的患者中，一项评估外科医生偏爱多多动脉嫁接的新分析可能有助于解释先前回顾性分析与关于长期生存的随机对照试验之间的不同结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/surgeon-preferences-may-ecplain-differences-in-cabg-survival-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/surgeon-preferences-may-ecplain-differences-in-cabg-survival-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79633c61-904A-4CF6-96DF-DD3052E5D244 Sat, 25 Jan 2025 04:43:28 -0500 Surgeon preferences may explain differences in CABG survival rates
研究表明，声音如何影响前庭功能低下的人的平衡前庭系统是内耳内部器官网络，可检测到头部的运动和位置。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/study-shows-how-the-the-sound-acound-actects-balance-in-people-with-vistibular-hypofunction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/study-shows-how-the-the-sound-sound-actects-balance-in-people-with-vistibular-hypofunction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e59491fa-fa-f8d2-4857-9eb4-393a86fea7c0 Sat, 25 Jan 2025 04:25:43 -0500 Study shows how the sound affects balance in people with vestibular hypofunction
垂死的细胞触发败血症的致命级联像毒笔一样，垂死的细胞用致命的信息刺穿了他们的邻居。这可能会使败血症，维杰·拉西南（Vijay Rathinam）及其同事在1月23日的牢房中的UConn医学学院报告中恶化。他们的发现可能会导致对这种危险疾病的新理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/dying-cells-trigger-a-lethal-cascade-in-sepsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/dying-cells-trigger-a-lethal-cascade-in-sepsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=636f92b1-d209-4f7a-bf10-bf10-4879bb5ea060 Sat, 25 Jan 2025 04:11:56 -0500 Dying cells trigger a lethal cascade in sepsis
针对成纤维细胞激活蛋白PET发布的新程序标准/实践指南核医学与分子成像学会（SNMMI）和欧洲核医学协会（EANM）已发布了使用成纤维细胞激活蛋白（FAP）PET的新程序标准/实践指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/new-procedure-standardpractice-guideline-for-for-for-fibroblast-activivation-protein-protein-pet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/new-procedure-andandardpractice-guideline-for-for-for-forbroblast-activivation-activivation-protein-pet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca8cd2b5-617a-4605-4605-af8f-42e42e4f362d5e1 Sat, 25 Jan 2025 04:07:10 -0500 New procedure standard/practice guideline released for fibroblast activation protein PET
阿斯利康获得了积极的肺癌治疗建议阿斯利康宣布，本周，它已从美国国家健康与护理研究所（NICE）获得了两项积极的建议，以治疗整个英格兰和威尔士的肺癌患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/astrazeneca-receives-posive-nice-nice-recommendations-for-lung-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/astrazeneca-receives-posive-nice-nice-recommendations-for-lung-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A543DAA9BF-4347-8159-8159-8193C852915F Sat, 25 Jan 2025 00:37:00 -0500 AstraZeneca receives positive NICE recommendations for lung cancer treatment
创新方法跟踪血液中的SARS-COV-2，以指导Covid-19治疗来自群众米布林斯将军的研究人员发现，最初设计用于癌症检测的方法还可以识别和监测血液中少量的SARS-COV-2完整病毒颗粒，以及来自急性Covid-19感染的患者的其他液体，从而创造了潜力指导患者的未来治疗。该研究发表在科学进步中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/innovative-pablecrace-tracks-sars-sars-cov-2-in-the-the-the-the-the-covid-covid-covid-19-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/innovative-pablecrace-tracks-sars-cov-2-in-the-the-the-the-th-the-covid-covid-covid-19-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39bfa765-73E5-4247-B263-84226A4F1C79 Sat, 25 Jan 2025 00:30:00 -0500 Innovative approach tracks SARS-CoV-2 in the blood to guide COVID-19 treatment
新药候选人显示有可能恢复MS患者的视力科罗拉多大学安索斯大学医学校园的研究人员发现了一个有希望的候选药物，可以帮助恢复患有多发性硬化症（MS）患者的视力和其他损害神经元的神经系统状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/new-drug-candidate-shows-potential-potential-to-restore-vision-vision-vision-ind-restore-inpeople-with-ms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/new-drug-candidate-shows-shows-potential-to-potential-to-restore-vision-vision-vision-in-people-with-ms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38931efb-7344-4A02-9B444444444-F892A48D4229 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:54:06 -0500 New drug candidate shows potential to restore vision in people with MS
大学医院介绍了用于椎间盘突出的背痛患者的内窥镜脊柱手术大学医院现在正在为需要治疗的患者提供内窥镜脊柱手术，以治疗由于脊柱椎间盘突出而导致的背痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/university-hospitals-indroduces-endroduces-endoscopic-spine-scine-serergery-for-back-pain-pain-pain-pain-with-herniand-discyss.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/university-hospitals-indroduces-endroduces-endoscopic-spine-spine-serergery-for-back-pain-pain pain-pain-paTients-with-herniand-disc.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=316079bf-29EF-41D2-8E86-23D9008888AAB Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:49:00 -0500 University Hospitals introduces endoscopic spine surgery for back pain patients with herniated discs
